trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para valores de classe base quando chamado pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados que é associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for a data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para um item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> created.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> criado.

trans-unit.source: The item to get an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for.
trans-unit.target: O item para o qual obter um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects for child items that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> deve retornar objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para itens filho que não são virtualizados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects for child items that are not virtualized; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects all child items.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> deve retornar <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objetos para os itens filho que não são virtualizados; <see langword="false" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> deve retornar <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objetos todos os itens filho.

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
trans-unit.target: O item no contêiner após o qual iniciar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The property that contains the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade que contém o valor a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um elemento pelo valor da propriedade especificado.

trans-unit.source: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no items match.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro item que corresponde ao critério de pesquisa; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se nenhum item corresponder a ele.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider>.
